InventoryReplenishmentPolicy.name: InventoryReplenishmentPolicy
InventoryReplenishmentPolicy.description: Represents a policy for replenishing inventory when the inventory quantity reaches a minimum level.

Description.description: The description of the inventory replenishment policy.

EffectiveEndDate.description: The date the inventory replenishment policy is no longer effective.

EffectiveStartDate.description: The date on which the inventory replenishment policy becomes effective.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record indirectly, for example, through a list view or related record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, and LastReferenceDate is not null, the user accessed this record or list view indirectly.

LocationReferenceRecordId.description: The location associated with the inventory replenishment policy.

MaximumInventoryQuantity.description: The maximum quantity for the inventory.

MinimumInventoryQuantity.description: The minimum quantity of the inventory at which the inventory is replenished.

Name.description: The name of the inventory replenishment policy.

OwnerId.description: ID of the owner of this object.

ProductReferenceRecordId.description: The product or the product classification associated with the inventory replenishment policy.

ReplenishmentAction.description: Specifies the action taken to replenish inventory.

ReplenishmentQuantityFormula.description: The formula to calculate the replenishment quantity. For example, MaximumQuantity - ProductItem.QuantityOnHand.

ReplenishmentSourceLocationId.description: The location from which the product is replenished.

ReplenishmentSrcLocCriterion.description: Specifies the criterion of determining the replenishment source location

Status.description: Specifies the status of the inventory replenishment policy.
